W18_LTXT_COMM_PRESIDENTBLD_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W18_LTXT_COMM_PRESIDENTBLD_000_DETAIL.text: The tallest building in the country and home to the presidential grounds.

W18_LTXT_COMM_CAPITOL_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W18_LTXT_COMM_CAPITOL_000_DETAIL.text: The building where the country's congress meets.

W18_LTXT_COMM_CONTROL_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W18_LTXT_COMM_CONTROL_000_DETAIL.text: This building is where many inspectors reside. Two have been chosen to represent each nation in the Union States.

W18_LTXT_COMM_POLICEHQ_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W18_LTXT_COMM_POLICEHQ_000_DETAIL.text: The building that houses the CCPD.

W18_LTXT_COMM_LUXURYHOTEL_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W18_LTXT_COMM_LUXURYHOTEL_000_DETAIL.text: A luxury hotel where VIPs stay and press conferences are occasionally held. The trees growing in the lobby are considered its symbol.

W18_LTXT_COMM_CONFERENCECTR_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W18_LTXT_COMM_CONFERENCECTR_000_DETAIL.text: A multipurpose hall used primarily for events and seminars, but also as a polling place during presidential elections.

W18_LTXT_COMM_OFFICE_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W18_LTXT_COMM_OFFICE_000_DETAIL.text: A giant office building used by companies large and small.

W18_LTXT_COMM_LAB_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W18_LTXT_COMM_LAB_000_DETAIL.text: A facility where the Union States conducts research across various fields. Some of its projects are known by the populace, but these are only the tip of the iceberg.

W18_LTXT_COMM_APARTMENT_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W18_LTXT_COMM_APARTMENT_000_DETAIL.text: A residential apartment complex for citizens of the Union States. All manner of people live here, from students to office workers.

W18_LTXT_COMM_UNDERSQUARE_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W18_LTXT_COMM_UNDERSQUARE_000_DETAIL.text: A commercial complex that is part of an underground train station. Popular with young people and families, the stage at its center is often used for small-scale events.

W18_LTXT_COMM_SUBWAYSTA_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W18_LTXT_COMM_SUBWAYSTA_000_DETAIL.text: A station on the underground train network that connects various cities. It's quite busy.

W18_GIMK_COMM_LIFTTOPPOS_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W18_GIMK_COMM_LIFTTOPPOS_000_DETAIL.text: An elevator that leads to the Upper Layer, where luxury hotels and official state buildings can be found.

W18_GIMK_COMM_LIFTTOPPOS_010_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W18_GIMK_COMM_LIFTTOPPOS_010_DETAIL.text: This elevator technically leads to the Upper Layer, but it's currently locked down by security personnel.

W18_GIMK_COMM_LIFTHIGHERPOS_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W18_GIMK_COMM_LIFTHIGHERPOS_000_DETAIL.text: An elevator leading directly to the presidential grounds. You can't use it without an advance appointment.

W18_GIMK_COMM_LIFTHIGHERPOS_010_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W18_GIMK_COMM_LIFTHIGHERPOS_010_DETAIL.text: An elevator leading directly to the presidential grounds. You don't have the authority to use it.

W18_GIMK_COMM_LIFTMIDDLEPOS_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W18_GIMK_COMM_LIFTMIDDLEPOS_000_DETAIL.text: An elevator that leads to the General Layer, where offices and residential buildings can be found. Many people live here.

W18_GIMK_COMM_LIFTLOWERUPPOS_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W18_GIMK_COMM_LIFTLOWERUPPOS_000_DETAIL.text: An elevator that leads to the Upper Layer, where luxury hotels and official state buildings can be found.

W18_GIMK_COMM_LIFTLOWERDWNPOS_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W18_GIMK_COMM_LIFTLOWERDWNPOS_000_DETAIL.text: An elevator that leads to the Lower Layer. This is where the subway is located, as well as shops for the basics of life.

W18_GIMK_COMM_LIFTBOTTOMPOS_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W18_GIMK_COMM_LIFTBOTTOMPOS_000_DETAIL.text: An elevator that leads to the General Layer, where office and residential buildings can be found. Many people live here.

W18_GIMK_COMM_LIFTBOTTOMPOS_010_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W18_GIMK_COMM_LIFTBOTTOMPOS_010_DETAIL.text: An elevator that would ordinarily take you up.  It's currently undergoing maintenance.

W18_WRLD_COMM_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W18_WRLD_COMM_000_DETAIL.text: You find yourself in a city of some kind. You certainly could have arrived in this world from a less-suspicious place, but fortunately, no one seemed to notice your arrival.

W18_EVAR_COMM_FIRST_ATTACK_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W18_EVAR_COMM_FIRST_ATTACK_000_DETAIL.text: Perhaps this elevator will take you to the surface?

W18_EVAR_COMM_TO_CATHEDRAL_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W18_EVAR_COMM_TO_CATHEDRAL_000_DETAIL.text: This manhole leads out of this world.

W18_EVAR_COMM_ABOUT_HERE_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W18_EVAR_COMM_ABOUT_HERE_000_DETAIL.text: Talk to the woman you met in the elevator about the strange phenomenon that occurred there.

W18_EVAR_COMM_RESERCHER_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W18_EVAR_COMM_RESERCHER_000_DETAIL.text: A scientist at the National Research Institute has a request for you.

W18_EVAR_COMM_LOST_CRYSTAL_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W18_EVAR_COMM_LOST_CRYSTAL_000_DETAIL.text: There's a lot of commotion around the Capitol. Ask law enforcement what's going on.

W18_EVAR_COMM_LOST_CRYSTAL_010_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W18_EVAR_COMM_LOST_CRYSTAL_010_DETAIL.text: You discover the person believed to have stolen that crystal from the Capitol. This is your chance to recover it.

W18_EVAR_COMM_FORUM_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W18_EVAR_COMM_FORUM_000_DETAIL.text: Presidential candidates are currently debating here. You can go inside since you're with a member of the press.

W18_EVAR_COMM_BATTLE_SIM_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W18_EVAR_COMM_BATTLE_SIM_000_DETAIL.text: You can ask the researcher to let you use the simulator.

W18_EVAR_COMM_VIP_HOTEL_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W18_EVAR_COMM_VIP_HOTEL_000_DETAIL.text: The Grand Capitol Hotel is supposedly very fancy.

W18_EVAR_COMM_SINGER_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W18_EVAR_COMM_SINGER_000_DETAIL.text: This is an event to commemorate the major label debut of a hot new artist. You should check it out.

W18_EVAR_COMM_ELEMENT_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W18_EVAR_COMM_ELEMENT_000_DETAIL.text: There's a commotion going on at the National Research Institute. What could have happened?

W18_EVAR_COMM_ELEMENT_010_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W18_EVAR_COMM_ELEMENT_010_DETAIL.text: The new energy source is currently out of control. Disable the interference device causing all the trouble.

W18_EVAR_COMM_DISCUSSION_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W18_EVAR_COMM_DISCUSSION_000_DETAIL.text: There's a cafe inside the Metropolitan Building.

W18_EVAR_COMM_CATS_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W18_EVAR_COMM_CATS_000_DETAIL.text: There are many cats in front of the Inspectorate, as well as a woman.

W18_EVAR_COMM_RESEARCH_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W18_EVAR_COMM_RESEARCH_000_DETAIL.text: There's someone strange in front of the station.

W18_EVAR_COMM_ARTIST_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W18_EVAR_COMM_ARTIST_000_DETAIL.text: Lita wants to visit the cafe in the Grand Capitol Hotel.

W18_EVAR_COMM_MEETING_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W18_EVAR_COMM_MEETING_000_DETAIL.text: Bailey is holding a rally to support his candidacy.

W18_EVAR_COMM_MEETING_010_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W18_EVAR_COMM_MEETING_010_DETAIL.text: This looks to be the person who abducted Lita at the campaign rally.

W18_EVAR_COMM_MEETING_040_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W18_EVAR_COMM_MEETING_040_DETAIL.text: The campaign rally seems to have reached its climax.

W18_EVAR_COMM_MELANCHOLY_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W18_EVAR_COMM_MELANCHOLY_000_DETAIL.text: Jessica is standing in front of the Inspectorate.

W18_EVAR_COMM_MELANCHOLY_010_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W18_EVAR_COMM_MELANCHOLY_010_DETAIL.text: Lita has come to a halt between the buildings. What's on her mind?

W18_EVAR_COMM_ELECTION_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W18_EVAR_COMM_ELECTION_000_DETAIL.text: The culture center is used as a polling place for this district of the city.

W18_EVAR_COMM_ELECTION_010_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W18_EVAR_COMM_ELECTION_010_DETAIL.text: This person carried a suspicious cardboard box away from the polling place.

W18_EVAR_COMM_WQBOSS_HUM_A_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W18_EVAR_COMM_WQBOSS_HUM_A_000_DETAIL.text: Your client is supposedly in the Inspectorate.

W18_EVAR_COMM_WQBOSS_HUM_B_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W18_EVAR_COMM_WQBOSS_HUM_B_000_DETAIL.text: Your client is supposedly in the Inspectorate.

W18_EVAR_COMM_WQBOSS_HUM_A_010_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W18_EVAR_COMM_WQBOSS_HUM_A_010_DETAIL.text: The wave is leading you to an elevator that can access the presidential grounds. It seems helping him with a request will help you fulfill your own goals.

W18_EVAR_COMM_WQBOSS_HUM_A_010_BUTTON.speaker: UI
W18_EVAR_COMM_WQBOSS_HUM_A_010_BUTTON.text: Stand in Front of the Elevator

W18_EVAR_COMM_WQBOSS_HUM_B_010_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W18_EVAR_COMM_WQBOSS_HUM_B_010_DETAIL.text: The wave is leading you to an elevator that can access the presidential grounds. It seems helping him with a request will help you fulfill your own goals.

W18_EVAR_COMM_WQBOSS_HUM_B_010_BUTTON.speaker: UI
W18_EVAR_COMM_WQBOSS_HUM_B_010_BUTTON.text: Stand in Front of the Elevator

W18_EVAR_COMM_WQBOSS_MEC_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W18_EVAR_COMM_WQBOSS_MEC_000_DETAIL.text: You've been summoned by a member of the anti-alien organization in the National Research Institute. This must be serious.

W18_EVAR_COMM_WQBOSS_MEC_010_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W18_EVAR_COMM_WQBOSS_MEC_010_DETAIL.text: Intermittent spatial distortions have been observed around the presidential grounds. This is clearly concerning; you should meet with the president at once.

W18_EVAR_COMM_WQBOSS_MEC_010_BUTTON.speaker: UI
W18_EVAR_COMM_WQBOSS_MEC_010_BUTTON.text: Stand in Front of the Elevator

W18_EVAR_COMM_WQBOSS_MON_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W18_EVAR_COMM_WQBOSS_MON_000_DETAIL.text: You've been summoned by a member of the anti-alien organization in the National Research Institute. This must be serious.

W18_EVAR_COMM_WQBOSS_MON_010_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W18_EVAR_COMM_WQBOSS_MON_010_DETAIL.text: Intermittent spatial distortions have been observed around the presidential grounds. This is clearly concerning; you should meet with the president at once.

W18_EVAR_COMM_WQBOSS_MON_010_BUTTON.speaker: UI
W18_EVAR_COMM_WQBOSS_MON_010_BUTTON.text: Stand in Front of the Elevator

W18_EVAR_COMM_WQEND_GOV_010_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W18_EVAR_COMM_WQEND_GOV_010_DETAIL.text: This is where you arrived in this world, and it's likely where you can leave it.

W18_EVAR_COMM_WQEND_GOV_010_BUTTON.speaker: UI
W18_EVAR_COMM_WQEND_GOV_010_BUTTON.text: Stand in Front of the Manhole

W18_EVAR_COMM_SECRET_MEETING_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W18_EVAR_COMM_SECRET_MEETING_000_DETAIL.text: You received word of a secret meeting taking place at this hotel. You should find out if this is true or not.

W18_EVAR_COMM_NEWS01_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W18_EVAR_COMM_NEWS01_000_DETAIL.text: It's almost night. You should head back to your room for today.

W18_EVAR_COMM_KAMAITACHI_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W18_EVAR_COMM_KAMAITACHI_000_DETAIL.text: This is the area where an anti-alien organization member detected a spatial distortion.

W18_EVAR_COMM_NEWS02_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W18_EVAR_COMM_NEWS02_000_DETAIL.text: It's almost night. You should head back to your room for today.

W18_EVAR_COMM_CAUSE_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W18_EVAR_COMM_CAUSE_000_DETAIL.text: This is the suspicious person who left the National Research Institute.

W18_EVAR_COMM_CAUSE_000_BUTTON.speaker: UI
W18_EVAR_COMM_CAUSE_000_BUTTON.text: Call Out to the Suspicious Individual

W18_EVAR_COMM_CAUSE_010_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W18_EVAR_COMM_CAUSE_010_DETAIL.text: It's the person who bumped into Lita. Why are they in such a rush?

W18_EVAR_COMM_NEWS03_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W18_EVAR_COMM_NEWS03_000_DETAIL.text: It's almost night. You should head back to your room for today.

W18_EVAR_COMM_RAID_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W18_EVAR_COMM_RAID_000_DETAIL.text: You hear the sound of sirens from inside the building. This is clearly where the crime is taking place.

W18_EVAR_COMM_NEWS04_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W18_EVAR_COMM_NEWS04_000_DETAIL.text: It's almost night. You should head back to your room for today.

W18_EVAR_COMM_PRESIDENT_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W18_EVAR_COMM_PRESIDENT_000_DETAIL.text: These two police officers are apparently pursuing aliens. You should speak with them.

W18_EVAR_COMM_NEWS05_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W18_EVAR_COMM_NEWS05_000_DETAIL.text: It's almost night. You should head back to your room for today.

W18_EVAR_COMM_NEWS06_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W18_EVAR_COMM_NEWS06_000_DETAIL.text: The presidential election will take place tomorrow. You should head back to your room for today.

W18_EVAR_COMM_NEWS07_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W18_EVAR_COMM_NEWS07_000_DETAIL.text: You should watch the latest update on the presidential election.

W18_EVAR_COMM_NEWS07_010_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W18_EVAR_COMM_NEWS07_010_DETAIL.text: You should watch the latest update on the presidential election.

W18_EVAR_COMM_NEWS07_020_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W18_EVAR_COMM_NEWS07_020_DETAIL.text: You should watch the latest update on the presidential election.

W18_EVAR_COMM_NEWS07_030_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W18_EVAR_COMM_NEWS07_030_DETAIL.text: You should watch the latest update on the presidential election.

W18_EVAR_COMM_NEWS07_040_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W18_EVAR_COMM_NEWS07_040_DETAIL.text: You should watch the latest update on the presidential election.

W18_EVAR_COMM_NEWS07_050_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W18_EVAR_COMM_NEWS07_050_DETAIL.text: You should watch the latest update on the presidential election.
